settings.text: Expected Shipping Date: Shipping begins November 23rd

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 108*48*120 mm (Single Box), 220*150*131 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Experience the nostalgic glow of 1985 with our officially licensed Transformers collection.

  • Light-up eyes and chests (character-dependent) with upgraded luminous effects
  • 20+ points of articulation for dynamic posing
  • Character-specific accessories and weapons
  • Exclusive display stands for Autobots and Decepticons
  • Easy assembly - no glue, brushes, or pliers needed
  • Rare chase figure: Metallic paint Optimus Prime (1 in 36 chance)
  • Sunstorm: Series-exclusive character with metallic face and large illuminated chest

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Suprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Surprise Contains:

  • Transformers Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Energon Cube x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Set Box: Surprise box format with 6 characters, including rare metallic Optimus Prime (1/36 chance)

settings.block_text: Authentic, Hasbro-approved 1985 Transformers designs that bring Generation 1 nostalgia right to your collection.
Thrilling surprise box format featuring six iconic characters, including a chance at the ultra-rare metallic Optimus Prime.
Select characters boast light-up eyes and chests that illuminate with a brilliant, long-lasting glow.
Highly articulated figures with 20+ joints, character-specific accessories, and exclusive display stands, including the series-exclusive Sunstorm with unique metallic detailing.

settings.heading: Come Gather Your Cybertron Army
settings.context: Each figure comes with a collector's card, energon cube, and surprise box packaging for added excitement. Collect them all to relive the classic '85 Transformers experience with a modern twist!

settings.heading: Unleash the Power Within: Transformers Shining Version 01
settings.text: Light-up '85 heroes in surprise boxes. 20+ articulation points. Optimus, Jazz, Megatron & more.  Glow-in-the-dark Autobots & Decepticons. 20+ joints, surprise unboxing. Chance for rare Megatron! No assembly needed.

settings.block_big_text3: Large light-up area on the chest

settings.block_text_02: The probability of receiving each Transformers is marked under each action figure. For example: 1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, 1 is a secret figure.

settings.heading: Level Up Your Collection: 1985 Legends, Illuminated
settings.text: Officially licensed Blokees Transformers are back with a luminous twist! Shining Version 02 features classic 1985 characters with glowing eyes and chests. Each surprise box contains a mystery figure, including the rare metallic Optimus Prime. With 20+ points of articulation, these figures are highly poseable. Collect them all and relive the magic!

settings.heading: Transformers Shining Version 02: Iconic '85 Bots Light Up!
settings.text: The Autobots and Decepticons shine brighter than ever in the Shining Version 02 collection! This series brings your favorite 1985 Transformers to life with glowing eyes and chests, premium articulation, and incredible detail. Collect them all and light up your display!

settings.heading2: Limited Edition Optimus Prime 1985 - Shining Version
settings.subheading2: Autobots, Assemble: Lead Your Collection to Victory!
settings.context2: Six expertly designed characters await, with a chance to reveal the secret Optimus Prime! This rare figure features striking details and a full metal finish. Each highly detailed, dynamic figurine is ready for action. Begin your Autobots army today!
settings.context3:
The special figure in this series is produced in a ratio of 1:36.
1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, there is 1 special figure.

settings.block_text: Classic Transformers characters featuring advanced light-up technology in eyes and chests, bringing the nostalgic 1985 designs to radiant life.
Experience the thrill of mystery with each purchase, perfect for collectors and fans alike.
Character-specific weapons and "Energon" props included.
Enhanced light-up mechanisms and fluorescent materials for striking displays.
Expand your collection with this SV02-specific Decepticon, boasting metallic facial details and an expansive light-up chest area.
Each figure includes 20+ points of articulation, allowing for dynamic poses and immersive play experiences.
Full-body metallic paint applications and intricate spray techniques ensure a high-quality, collector-grade appearance.
Complete package includes figure, character-specific accessories, "Energon" prop, and themed display base (Autobot or Decepticon).

settings.heading: Collect the Glow: 1985 Edition
settings.context: Surprise Boxes Filled with Nostalgic Characters and Luminous

settings.title: Imagination Master
settings.context: My son spends hours building and playing with the Fractured Space-Time. His creativity and problem-solving skills have noticeably improved. These sets are a fantastic way to keep him engaged and learning!

settings.title: Tough Mom
settings.context: As a mom, I appreciate toys that can withstand rough play. These figures are incredibly durable and have survived countless battles. They’re worth every penny for their longevity alone!

settings.title: Transformers Fan
settings.context: As a lifelong Transformers fan, I’m blown away by the detail and quality of these figures. They’re more than just toys—they’re collectible masterpieces. A must-have for any serious collector.

settings.title: Safety First Dad
settings.context: I’m always concerned about the safety of the toys my kids play with. Knowing these figures are made from non-toxic materials and meeting all safety standards gives me peace of mind. Plus, my kids love them!

settings.title: Mystery Lover
settings.context: I recently purchased a blind box from the Fractured Space-Time, and the excitement of not knowing which figure I’d get was thrilling! The anticipation and surprise were worth every penny. I ended up with a rare character, and it made my day. These blind boxes are a fantastic addition to any collection and keep the excitement alive.

settings.title: Pose Master
settings.context: With over 20+ points of articulation, these figures allow for dynamic poses and imaginative play. My kids love recreating epic battle scenes and coming up with new adventures.

settings.title: Family Fun
settings.context: We bought these sets for our family game night, and everyone had a blast! From my youngest to my oldest, everyone enjoyed building and playing together. It’s a great way to spend quality time as a family.

settings.title: Anniversary Collector
settings.context: The 40th anniversary edition figures are incredible! They pay perfect homage to the Transformers legacy. I’m thrilled to add them to my collection.

settings.title: Builder Dad
settings.context: The 41-53 pieces in each set offer endless building possibilities. My kids constantly come up with new characters and vehicles. It’s amazing to see their imaginations at work.

settings.title: Gift Lover
settings.context: I gave these to my nephew for his birthday, and he was over the moon! The figures are high-quality and provide hours of entertainment. It’s the perfect gift for any Transformers fan.

settings.title: Together Mom
settings.context: Building these sets together has brought my family closer. We all enjoy the creative process and the fun that follows. It’s a wonderful way to bond and create lasting memories.

settings.heading: Legendary Glow: 1985 Transformers Display
settings.context: Experience the Brilliance of Iconic Heroes and Villains

settings.block_title: What's the chance of getting the rare metallic Optimus Prime?
settings.block_text: The metallic Optimus Prime is a secret figure with a 1/36 chance. This means for every 36 boxes produced, one contains this special variant.

settings.block_title: Are these figures poseable? How sturdy are they?
settings.block_text: Yes, each figure has 20+ points of articulation for dynamic posing. They're made of durable ABS plastic, designed to withstand regular play and posing without easily breaking.

settings.block_title: Can I choose which character I get?
settings.block_text: No, these come in surprise boxes for a surprise element. However, each box is clearly labeled with the series name, so you're guaranteed a figure from the Shining Version 02: 1985 Edition.

settings.block_title: Are these suitable for young children?
settings.block_text: While highly collectable, these figures are recommended for ages 10 and up due to small parts and the detailed nature of the figures.

settings.block_title: Is Sunstorm available in other Transformers lines?
settings.block_text: Sunstorm is exclusive to this SV02 series.

settings.block_title: How do I care for and clean these figures?
settings.block_text: Gently dust with a soft, dry cloth. Avoid using water or cleaning chemicals as they may damage the paint or light-up features.

settings.block_title: Are these figures safe? What materials are used?
settings.block_text: Yes, these figures are designed with safety in mind. They're made primarily of ABS plastic, which is durable and non-toxic. The light-up features use safe PCBA (Printed Circuit Board Assembly) technology. No batteries are used, eliminating risks associated with battery leakage or swallowing.

settings.block_title: Can the parts of these figures cause choking hazards?
settings.block_text: While the figures are designed as solid pieces, they do come with small accessories. As such, they're recommended for ages 10 and up to prevent choking hazards for younger children.

settings.block_title: Are the paints and finishes used on these figures non-toxic?
settings.block_text: Yes, all paints and finishes used are non-toxic and compliant with international toy safety standards. They're safe for handling but not intended for mouthing or ingestion.

settings.block_title: Do these figures contain any allergens?
settings.block_text: The figures are made of synthetic materials and should not contain common allergens. However, if you have specific allergies, please contact customer service for detailed information.

settings.block_title: Are these figures tested for safety?
settings.block_text: Yes, these figures undergo rigorous safety testing to meet or exceed international toy safety standards, including tests for physical and mechanical properties, flammability, and chemical composition.

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
